1.subject: Welcome Ronald!
1.body: Welcome to the email system, Ronald!

2.subject: Test Email - MCP Verification
2.body:
Hi John,

This is a test email to verify the email MCP is working correctly. I'm testing the send functionality.

Best regards,
Ronald Kelly

3.subject: Quick Check-in
3.body:
Hi Jane,

Just wanted to check in and see how everything is going. Let me know if you need anything from my end.

Cheers,
Ronald
